Summary: Ufo hovering with 2 other ufos checking it out
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St Helens
There were no other sightings in St Helens on or around December 3rd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 5:45 PST I was sitting on my back porch and noticed what is known as a chemtrail and a light making weird blinks below it as it slowly was rising i decided to get my camera and film it after 2 min of film i decided to go back inside when 2 red lights come from the south toward the objects at super speed i turned back on the camera and was filmin and looking at the event with my regualr sight as the camera filmed. About 5 seconds after the 2 red lights aproached the object the bottom red light started flying toward me and went right over my house it was circle in shape with about 60-80 red lights in a circular motion on the bottom of the craft and made a 180 turn and headed back the way it came. I ran inside to see the video immediately and the film with the red lights had been erased but the film with the other light was still there and the pic. I was really irreated it was not there and looked at my cellphone and it had been turned off also. Also when the craft went my I noticed a really odd smell almost bitter I have never smelled anything like it and it didnt last but about 10 seconds.
